snippet: Senator Marco Rubio said that he would wait until the end of the year to consider running, and that he did not believe humans were responsible for “dramatic changes” in the climate.
abstract: Sen Marco Rubio, in wide-ranging television interview on This Week With George Stephanopoulos, disagrees with accepted scientific wisdom that humans are having effect on climate change; remarks come in interview in which he drops hints about running for president in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Senator Marco Rubio said that he would wait until the end of the year to consider running, and that he did not believe humans were responsible for “dramatic changes” in the climate.

headline.main: Rubio on a Presidential Bid, and Climate Change
headline.print_headline: Rubio Denies Humans Have an Effect on Climate Change
